entry.title: The (k)Nights Keep On Ticking By
entry.summary:
Author: AristoMuse

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,844Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 85

Summary: The days after the CODE BLACK had been sent out were bleak.The Bat family was left scrambling: for gear, for information. For a home. As soon as the alert had went out, Jason had sent you one email before going dark.-Don’t leave home. Stay safe. Please.-Of course you didn’t listen.(Vaguely follows the plot of Gotham Knights, but prior knowledge isn't necessary to read this)

entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,588Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 525

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner―you can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.

entry.title: The Other Side of Waiting in Vain
entry.summary:
Author: Natsuzu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,537Chapters: 7/9Kudos: 317

Summary: Soulmates are always guaranteed to meet each other, so it should have been impossible for your soulmate to die a complete stranger. Still heartbroken nine years after his death, you move back to Gotham City and find yourself falling for the vigilante named Red Hood. It feels like falling in love with your soulmate all over again, but it’s impossible for the dead to come back to life… right?Or: you have a pain-sharing soulmate bond with Jason Todd, but neither of you know you're soulmates

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,769Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: Jason fails to communicate that he will be gone for days. They’re special.But none of those are being used right now.“Jason Peter Todd-Wayne.” You clenched your teeth to the man that clearly disappeared without notice.It sure as hell wasn’t the time.

entry.title: Cracks in the Armor
entry.summary:
Author: arkham_bunniii

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,328Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 103

Summary: You were a former GCPD detective who left the force after Gotham’s corruption pushed you too far. Now, you work in the gray area of Gotham’s underworld—tracking weapons, gathering intel, and occasionally taking down the scum that even the Bat can’t reach.When the Arkham Knight arrives, he doesn’t just tear through Gotham… he takes it over in a single night. Every time you cross paths, it’s the same: a dangerous game of cat and mouse.You’re enemies. You should be enemies. But every fight, every standoff, pulls you closer, and something tells you there’s more to this soldier than the armor he wears.All your begging to ask is, what’s really beneath that helmet?

entry.title: Scarlet
entry.summary:
Author: warisa_racket

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,917Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 40

Summary: ❣ exlover!JasonTodd x F!reader❣ 20th century anachronistic neonoir au; exes to lovers; no superheroes in this one, just a morally grey underworld criminal Jason Todd❣ Summary: You’re a law student moonlighting as a jazz club singer to make ends meet. Between balancing your studies and side-gig, you’ve willed yourself into believing that you’re over him, that you’re strong enough to detach yourself from him despite his efforts to nudge his way back into your life. Suddenly, you see him everywhere, and your life derails again as you fight to keep both you and Jason afloat.Exhausted and withdrawn, Jason has spent the last year trying to piece himself back together after your breakup. Enticed by numbness and increasingly reckless in his behavior, Jason let himself be pulled in too many different directions, the distractions and bustle of life demanding that he focus on anything but your absence. At his breaking point, he shows up to your job, just for a glimpse of you, to hear your voice lulling him into a false sense of hope that maybe he can remind you that he’s yours.

entry.title: Kiss the Blade, Bear the Bullet
entry.summary:
Author: MiyuKazu

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,694Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Gotham doesn’t raise heroes. It forges weapons. Broken ones. Beautiful ones. The kind that don’t realize they’re bleeding until they’re already drowning.Jason Todd is one of them.She is not.She wasn’t raised in Gotham. She was raised in silence. In shadow.With discipline for lullabies, and blades for toys.“You are the child of a Ghost and an Angel, do you understand?” Her father asks. She doesn’t understand, but she nods regardless.“Your title is Nephilim.” He says. His large hand cups her face, tilting her chin up to look at him. “Your true name and face are privileges that few people on this planet will ever have the opportunity to know.”Her father’s legacy is a noose— tightening since the day she was born.Two weapons; broken and reforged. One carved from fire and tragedy, the other shaped in silence and purpose. Their stories are not parallel. They are tangled. Twisted.Fated.
